original_text: Hear therefore, O Israel, and be careful to do them, that it may go well with you, and that you may multiply greatly, as the Lord, the God of your fathers, has promised you, in a land flowing with milk and honey.
korean_text: 이스라엘아 듣고 삼가 그것을 행하라 그리하면 네가 복을 받고 네 조상들의 하나님 여호와께서 네게 허락하심 같이 젖과 꿀이 흐르는 땅에서 네가 크게 번성하리라

sentences.original_text: and be careful to do them,
that it may go well with you,
and that you may multiply greatly,
as the Lord, the God of your fathers, has promised you,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너의 조상들의 하나님 주께서 네게 약속하신 대로니라.

sentences.original_text: in a land flowing with milk and honey.
